Package actors

package actors
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Hero
    Hero class, inherits the Person class and has a static variable to keep track of the number of heroes created
    Person
    Person class, used as a parent class for the Hero and Villain classes
    Villain
    Villain class, inherits the Person class and has a static variable to keep track of the number of villains created
